porto_alegre.name: Tecnopuc
porto_alegre.info: One of the largest and most important technology parks in Brazil, linked to PUCRS.

porto_alegre.name: Instituto Caldeira
porto_alegre.info: An innovation ecosystem that connects large companies, startups, and universities.

porto_alegre.name: Tecnosinos
porto_alegre.info: Technology park in São Leopoldo, focused on information and communication technology.

porto_alegre.name: Inova RS
porto_alegre.info: A program by the RS government to foster innovation in different sectors of the Gaúcho economy.

porto_alegre.name: Porto Alegre City Hall / Pacto Alegre
porto_alegre.info: An initiative that seeks to transform Porto Alegre into a hub for innovation and entrepreneurship.

porto_alegre.name: Numerik
porto_alegre.info: Consultancy specialized in innovation and digital transformation.

passo_fundo.name: UPF Tech Park
passo_fundo.info: Technology park linked to the University of Passo Fundo, one of the pioneers in the region.

passo_fundo.name: Passo Fundo City Hall
passo_fundo.info: Innovation Secretariat focused on strengthening the connection between local ecosystem actors.

passo_fundo.name: Inova RS Cluster Noroeste
passo_fundo.info: Regional cluster of the Inova RS program, focused on the development of innovation in the Northwest region of the state.

passo_fundo.name: Comunidade Vértice
passo_fundo.info: Local initiative that drives innovation and strengthens the Passo Fundo ecosystem.

passo_fundo.name: Ricardo Fantinelli
passo_fundo.info: Professional with vast experience in brand management, design, and technology, active in the Passo Fundo innovation ecosystem.
